entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Quispamsis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:11 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain late in the evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
